Atk.name: Staff
Atk.desc: Basic staff attack.

Atk.name: Mace
Atk.desc: Basic mace attack.

Atk.name: Stunner
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Stunned.

Atk.name: Bonebreaker
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Weakened.

Atk.name: Umbral Strike
Atk.soundAndFX: SFX[Umbral Burn:0.35],SFX[Umbral Burn 2:1.18],SFX[Swoosh Dodge:1.18],SFX[Umbral Burn 2:1.60],SFX[Swoosh Dodge:1.60],SFX[Umbral Burn 3 (Echo):1.65],SFX[Mace Hit 3:1.9],VFX[Smash:OnTargets:1.9:0|0|0.6]
Atk.desc: Knockback; base 50% chance to cause Stunned and 75% to cause Softened.

Atk.name: Cripple
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Immobilized.

Atk.name: Axe
Atk.desc: Basic axe attack.

Atk.name: Overhead Chop
Atk.desc: A damaging but inaccurate axe attack.

Atk.name: Armor Rend
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Softened.

Atk.name: Whirlwind
Atk.desc: Slash in a 360-degree arc.

Atk.name: Throw Axe
Atk.desc: Ranged axe attack.

Atk.name: Sword
Atk.desc: Basic sword attack.

Atk.name: Cut
Atk.desc: A quick slash that doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Thrust
Atk.desc: A quick thrust that doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Lunge
Atk.desc: Move to target, deal heavy Pierce damage; requires Thrust.

Atk.name: Overhead Strike
Atk.desc: A damaging but inaccurate sword attack.

Atk.name: Backhander
Atk.desc: Strike with one's back to the target.

Atk.name: Slice
Atk.desc: Slash in a 90-degree arc.

Atk.name: Double Strike
Atk.desc: A two-part sword strike.

Atk.name: Feint
Atk.desc: Base 100% chance to cause Distracted. Cannot be counterattacked. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Disarm
Atk.desc: Base 100% chance to cause Disarmed. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Disarming Strike
Atk.desc: Sword blow with a base 60% chance to cause Disarmed. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Pocket Sand
Atk.desc: 75% chance of causing Blinded for 2 rounds. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Claw
Atk.desc: Basic claw attack. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Dive
Atk.desc: Heavy blow that knocks the target back 1 space.

Atk.name: Claws
Atk.desc: Hit up to 2 targets diagonally. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Lance
Atk.desc: Basic lance attack. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Halberd
Atk.desc: Slashing attack. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Charge
Atk.desc: Move to target, knockback; 2X 50% chance of Stunned.

Atk.name: Mega Charge
Atk.desc: Move to target, knockback; 2X 75% chance of Stunned.

Atk.name: Crossbow
Atk.desc: Basic crossbow attack.

Atk.name: Poison Bolt
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Poisoned.

Atk.name: Piercing Bolt
Atk.desc: Pierce up to 2 enemies in a row.

Atk.name: Bayonet
Atk.desc: Basic bayonet attack.

Atk.name: Spear
Atk.desc: Basic spear attack.

Atk.name: Pinning Thrust
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Immobilized.

Atk.name: Stick-and-Drag
Atk.desc: Spear the target and pull it backward one space.

Atk.name: Stick-and-Drag 2
Atk.desc: Spear the target and pull it backward two spaces.

Atk.name: Impale
Atk.desc: Pierce up to 2 enemies in a row.

Atk.name: Shield Bash
Atk.desc: Knocks the target back 1 space; can cause Stunned.

Atk.name: Bow
Atk.desc: Basic bow attack. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Pinning Shot
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Immobilized.

Atk.name: Quick Shot
Atk.desc: A weak bow attack that doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Longbow
Atk.desc: Long-range shot; more range, accuracy than Arced Shot.

Atk.name: Arced Shot
Atk.desc: Inaccurate long-range Bow shot.

Atk.name: Split Shot
Atk.desc: Hit up to 2 targets.

Atk.name: Split Shot 2
Atk.desc: Hit up to 3 targets.

Atk.name: Trueshaft
Atk.desc: Shot that hits true for heavy damage. Knocks the target back 1 space.

Atk.name: Knife
Atk.desc: Knife strike: 100% backstab / 25% sidestab bonus.

Atk.name: Throw Knife
Atk.desc: Ranged attack that doesn't end the turn. 100% backstab / 25% sidestab bonus.

Atk.name: Stab
Atk.desc: Knife strike: 125% backstab / 50% sidestab bonus.

Atk.name: Mega Stab
Atk.desc: Knife strike: 150% backstab / 75% sidestab bonus.

Atk.name: Pilfer
Atk.desc: Deal a flat 50 damage to a chest. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Wrench
Atk.desc: Basic wrench attack.

Atk.name: Fist
Atk.desc: Basic punching attack.

Atk.name: Smash
Atk.desc: Knocks the target back 1 space; can cause Stunned.

Atk.name: Shockwave
Atk.desc: Slam the ground, damaging and potentially Stunning everyone nearby.

Atk.name: Spin Saw
Atk.desc: Slice in a 90-degree arc.

Atk.name: Spin Saw 2
Atk.desc: Slice up to 2 enemies in a row.

Atk.name: Rending Arc
Atk.desc: A huge swing; can cause Softened.

Atk.name: Spikes
Atk.desc: Damages an attacker who gets too close.

Atk.name: Burn
Atk.desc: Damages an attacker who gets too close.

Atk.name: Shove
Atk.desc: Push the target one space.

Atk.name: Shove 2
Atk.desc: Push the target two spaces.

Atk.name: Pull
Atk.desc: Pull the target backward one space.

Atk.name: Pull 2
Atk.desc: Pull the target backward two spaces.

Atk.name: Toss
Atk.desc: Toss the target up to 2 spaces.

Atk.name: Throw
Atk.desc: Throw the target up to 3 spaces.

Atk.name: Hurl
Atk.desc: Hurl the target up to 4 spaces.

Atk.name: Backthrow
Atk.desc: Throw the target 2 spaces behind you.

Atk.name: Kinetic Constriction
Atk.desc: Psychically crush the target with high accuracy.

Atk.name: Kinetic Gust
Atk.desc: Push the target away from you.

Atk.name: Kinetic Pull
Atk.desc: Pull the target toward you.

Atk.name: Kinetic Wind
Atk.desc: Push the target up to 2 spaces.

Atk.name: Kinetic Gale
Atk.desc: Push the target up to 3 spaces.

Atk.name: Kinetic Vacuum
Atk.desc: Pull the target up to 2 spaces.

Atk.name: Kinetic Wave
Atk.desc: Push all targets up to 2 spaces.

Atk.name: Kinetic Surge
Atk.desc: Push all targets up to 3 spaces.

Atk.name: Gravity Spike
Atk.desc: Flyer crashes to earth, is Heavy for a turn.

Atk.name: Gravity Well
Atk.desc: Flyers crash to earth, are Heavy for a turn.

Atk.name: Grapple Pull
Atk.desc: Pull the target toward you.

Atk.name: Swim
Atk.desc: Swim a space in any direction; ends the turn.

Atk.name: Leap
Atk.desc: Jump over a character or obstacle. Unlimited usage per turn.

Atk.name: Jump
Atk.desc: Jump over a character or obstacle. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Shadowport
Atk.desc: Teleport through characters or obstacles. Unlimited usage per turn.

Atk.name: Juxtapose
Atk.desc: Switch spaces with target character. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Trade
Atk.desc: Switch spaces with an allied character.

Atk.name: Twirl
Atk.desc: Switch spaces with any character. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Quick Twirl
Atk.desc: Switch spaces with any character. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Unlock Door
Atk.desc: Unlock a locked door. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Create Fire
Atk.desc: Create a raging fire on an open space.

Atk.name: Create Ice
Atk.desc: Create a pillar of jagged ice on an open space.

Atk.name: Build Wood Bridge
Atk.desc: Place a wooden bridge. Unlimited usage per turn.

Atk.name: Build Wood Bridge 2
Atk.desc: Place up to 3 wooden bridges. Unlimited usage per turn.

Atk.name: Build Stone Bridge
Atk.desc: Place a stone bridge. Unlimited usage per turn.

Atk.name: Build Wood Barricade
Atk.desc: Place a wooden barricade. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Build Wood Barricade 2
Atk.desc: Place up to 3 wooden barricades. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Build Spiked Barricade
Atk.desc: Place a spiky barricade. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Build Stone Barricade
Atk.desc: Place a durable stone barrier that stops flyers. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Place Brazier
Atk.desc: Place a brazier that reveals fog of war in a 3-tile radius. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Place Charges
Atk.desc: Place high explosives. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Place Timed Charges
Atk.desc: Place pre-lit high explosives. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Place Caltrops
Atk.desc: Place a trap that damages and slows. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Place Caltrops 2
Atk.desc: Throw down a row of traps that damage and slow. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Place Snare Trap
Atk.desc: Place a trap that stuns. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Place Iron Jaw Trap
Atk.desc: Place a trap that stuns, damages, and slows. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Solid State Shield
Atk.desc: Create a solid psychokinetic barrier.

Atk.name: Decoy
Atk.desc: Induce a hallucinatory target for the enemy. Can move after using.

Atk.name: Hold
Atk.desc: Holds spaces, stopping enemies from moving through (or away from) them.

Atk.name: Grappler Stance
Atk.desc: Hold a space, stopping enemies from moving through (or away from) it.

Atk.name: Explode
Atk.desc: Explode automatically upon death.

Atk.name: Powder Bolt
Atk.desc: Crossbow bolt for destroying objects.

Atk.name: Grape Shot
Atk.desc: Bolt with explosive shrapnel.

Atk.name: Mind Shield
Atk.desc: Heal the target.

Atk.name: Far Shield
Atk.desc: Heal the target.

Atk.name: Mega Shield
Atk.desc: Heal the target with much greater power.

Atk.name: Long Shield
Atk.desc: Heal up to 3 targets in a row.

Atk.name: Big Shield
Atk.desc: Heal self and all nearby allies.

Atk.name: Static Shield
Atk.desc: Boosts maximum health for the battle.

Atk.name: Titan Shield
Atk.desc: A healing shield of incredible size and power.

Atk.name: Transfer
Atk.desc: Donate Energy to an ally.

Atk.name: Transfer 2
Atk.desc: Donate Energy to all nearby allies.

Atk.name: Self Repair
Atk.desc: Repair self. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Tune Up
Atk.desc: Repair damage to a golem and boost its Strength 25% until next turn.

Atk.name: Recharge
Atk.desc: Restore energy to a golem and grant it +1 Counterattacks and +1 Reflexes until next turn.

Atk.name: Awareness
Atk.desc: +1 Counterattacks and +1 Reflexes until next turn. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Sprint
Atk.desc: 40% of Speed added to max movement this turn. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Engine Boost
Atk.desc: Build up speed! +67% movement for the turn.

Atk.name: Levitate
Atk.desc: Fly until next turn. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Levitate Other
Atk.desc: Target flies until next turn.

Atk.name: Hover
Atk.desc: Fly until next turn. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Motivate
Atk.desc: Target gets another turn.

Atk.name: Inspire
Atk.desc: All adjacent characters get another turn.

Atk.name: Aim
Atk.desc: Boost Strength by 25% for this turn. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Clarify
Atk.desc: Boost Accuracy by 50% for 3 turns.

Atk.name: Stimulate
Atk.desc: Boost Psy by 25% for 3 turns.

Atk.name: Adrenaline
Atk.desc: Target gets 40% of Speed added to max movement for the turn.

Atk.name: Deep Breath
Atk.desc: Boost Psy by 50% through the next round.

Atk.name: Hide
Atk.desc: Be Hidden to the enemy until user's next turn. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Preemptive Stance
Atk.desc: Counterattack preemptively until user's next turn.

Atk.name: Defiant Stance
Atk.desc: +100% Strength until user's next turn.

Atk.name: Guard Stance
Atk.desc: +1 Counterattacks and +1 Reflexes until user's next turn.

Atk.name: Nimble Stance
Atk.desc: +20% Dodge, +1 Counterattacks, and +1 Reflexes until user's next turn.

Atk.name: Defensive Stance
Atk.desc: Gain a 50% Block chance until user's next turn.

Atk.name: Mind Blast
Atk.desc: Basic mental attack. Always hits.

Atk.name: Mind Shock
Atk.desc: Always hits; base 75% chance to cause Stunned.

Atk.name: Feedback
Atk.desc: Damage the enemy while self-healing. Always hits.

Atk.name: Vengeance
Atk.desc: Damage 3 targets in a row while self-healing. Always hits.

Atk.name: Nauseate
Atk.desc: Damage the target's energy. Base 50%/75% chance to cause Slowed/Sick.

Atk.name: Soul Suck
Atk.desc: Damage a target and regain Energy.

Atk.name: Drain
Atk.desc: Heavily damage the target's Energy. High chance to cause Clouded.

Atk.name: Possess
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to control target for the turn, user becomes Hidden. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Mind Control
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to control target for the turn. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Mind Domination
Atk.desc: Base 100% chance to control target for the turn. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Throw Voice
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Distracted. Cannot be counterattacked; doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Fire Breath
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Burning.

Atk.name: Fire Breath 2
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Burning.

Atk.name: Fire Breath 3
Atk.desc: Cone-shaped. Base 50% chance to cause Burning.

Atk.name: Pyro Blast
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Burning.

Atk.name: Pyro Hail
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Burning.

Atk.name: Overheat
Atk.desc: Sap the targets' energy, then health with intense heat. Chance to sicken for 1 round.

Atk.name: Fire Gate
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Burning.

Atk.name: Defrost
Atk.desc: Cure Frozen and increase Cold resistance.

Atk.name: Frost Breath
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Frozen.

Atk.name: Frost Breath 2
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Frozen.

Atk.name: Frost Breath 3
Atk.desc: Cone-shaped. Base 50% chance to cause Frozen.

Atk.name: Cryo Blast
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Frozen.

Atk.name: Cryo Cross
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Frozen over a wide area. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Frost Armor
Atk.desc: Harden an ally against physical attacks for 4 turns.

Atk.name: Frost Army
Atk.desc: Harden allies against physical attacks for 4 turns.

Atk.name: Douse
Atk.desc: Cure Burning and increase Heat resistance.

Atk.name: Dark Breath
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Immobilized and/or Softened.

Atk.name: Dark Breath 2
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Immobilized and/or Softened.

Atk.name: Dark Breath 3
Atk.desc: Cone-shaped. Base 75% chance to cause Immobilized and/or Softened.

Atk.name: Shadow Blast
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Immobilized and/or Softened.

Atk.name: Dark Vortex
Atk.desc: Base 75% chance to cause Immobilized and/or Softened.

Atk.name: Fury
Atk.desc: Boost an ally's strength by 25% for 3 turns.

Atk.name: Terror
Atk.desc: Drops Mental Res., chance to cause Stunned, Immobilized, Weakened, Clouded, Distracted.

Atk.name: Miasma
Atk.desc: Base 50%/75% chance to cause Immobilized/Softened. Doesn't end the turn.

Atk.name: Light Breath
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Blinded. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Light Breath 2
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Blinded. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Light Breath 3
Atk.desc: Cone-shaped. Base 50% chance to cause Blinded. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Laser Blast
Atk.desc: Hits numerous targets in a row. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Light Blast
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Blinded. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Light Bomb
Atk.desc: Base 50% chance to cause Blinded. Cannot be counterattacked.

Atk.name: Blinding Cloak
Atk.desc: Make an ally Shining for 3 turns for a Dodge boost.

Atk.name: Dazzle
Atk.desc: Drops Light Res., causes Blinded and 50% chance of Distracted. Cannot be counterattacked; doesn't end turn.
